full_summary:
**
**Quality Assurance/Management Specialist (Senior) – Solicitation 1000430258**
=====================================================

**Background and Context**
------------------------

The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) invites qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders to submit a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Quality Assurance/Management Specialist (Senior) services. This requirement is open only to SA Holders who have qualified under Tier 1 for the Quality Assurance/Management Specialist (Senior) - Stream 3 - Project Management Services category.

**Objective**
------------

The objective of this requirement is to provide expertise to lead the development of a comprehensive quality assurance framework for the CRA Compensation program. The selected contractor will also support the development of project plans required to execute the project, including defining roles and responsibilities, scope of reviews, processes, tools, measurement criteria, and reporting overview.

**Key Requirements**
-------------------

*    Comprehensive quality assurance framework development
*    Project planning and management
*    Role definition and responsibilities
*    Scope of reviews and processes definition
*    Tools and measurement criteria definition
*    Reporting overview development

**Security Requirements**
----------------------

*    Company minimum security level: Protected B
*    Resource(s) minimum security level: Authorization to access Protected B information and Reliability status - Protected B

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

This solicitation is subject to various trade agreements, including:
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCoFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPaFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Contract Duration**
------------------

The proposed contract duration is from contract award to March 31, 2024, with irrevocable options to extend the term for up to two (2) 6-month periods under the same conditions.

**Estimated Level of Effort**
---------------------------

The estimated initial contract period is 210 working days, while the estimated level of effort for the option periods is currently not foreseeable.

**Submission Guidelines**
-----------------------

Submissions must be received by [Due Date] at the address below:
*    Allete of submissions: CRA – BRUg@cra-arc.gc
